rules_text:
Haste
{R}{W}, {T}: You may put a Vehicle card from your hand onto the battlefield. That Vehicle gains haste and becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.
special_text:
First mate–Your starting deck contains at least twelve Vehicles. [i](If this card outside the game is your chosen first mate, you may swap it with a card in your opening hand.)[/i]
